title: 2-bedroom split plan unit located in the heart of downtown Miami
posting_body: ['$%% 2-bedroom split plan unit located in the heart of downtown Miami with awe inspiring views from every room.', 'Huge balcony.', 'NE exposure.', 'Dramatic & impressive views of Biscayne Bay and the ocean!', 'Glossy tile floors throughout.', 'Black-out shades in the bedrooms.', 'Water, basic cable and Internet included.', 'One assigned parking space.', 'Upgraded washer and dryer.', 'Walk to Whole Foods Market, Bayfront Park, metro mover, Novikov Restaurant and Joe & The Juice downstairs plus 17-screen Silverspot Cinema at Met Square.', 'Building offers luxurious life style, 24-hr front desk attended.', 'Chic downtown living at its best!$%%', '#$%If you have been denied an application for lease in the past due to bad credit or your background, please call me or text me', 'show contact info', ', I will get you approved!!', 'Self-employed, bad credit, no problem.', 'Text me, I respond immediately and have tons of inventory!', 'WE ARE ESSENTIAL BUSINESS FOR COVI19, WE ARE ALWAYS OPEN', 'CALL ME OR TEXT ME', 'Andy Zamudio', 'show contact info', 'We accept deposits with credit card if you are short of cash we help with that, we are the only company that accepts credit cards for deposits , zelle, cash app, paypal venmo payments accepted!!!', 'Aceptamos los depositos con tarjeta de credito sinud esta corto de cash, somos la unica compañia que lo acepta en Florida, zelle, cash app, paypal ,venmo.']
